item.title: Let's idea, how to design travel app (12Bay) on watchOS?
item.description: Abstract Before we start to code. We should think about What is a purple of the application? Currently, We have multiple apps on macOS, iOS and ipadOS. With an app on watchOS, what needs should it meet? Find it out, and let’s design. This article talk about 12bay UI/UX on watchos What is a purple of the application? How to design it? After one hour to survey I have some idea about functions of the app as follows:

item.title: Apple Watch Series
item.description: Abstract In this part, I started to learn about SwiftUI to build apple watch app for 12bay app.Through this part, the desired result is to build 12bay application for apple watch and learn about new knowledge such as SwiftUI, Combine framework in the field of Wearable App Integration. Completing this section, we must know the following knowledge: Have knowledge about SwiftUI. Have knowledge about Combine framework Have knowledge about Watchkit app architecture Have knowledge about HealthKit, WatchKit Develop 12Bay application on watchOS Motivation Wearable App Integration
